content: Choosing the correct real estate agent to purchase your home is one of the most important decisions you’ll make. Your home is a very personal, important, and valuable asset, and it can be an emotional and complicated endeavor to purchase it, especially in today’s challenging marketplace. Numerous questions and concerns will need to be addressed, and the advice and consultation that you receive can make a tremendous difference in the results.

kanroku is truly a full-service brokerage, and  we are not just a real estate agent, Its a licensed real estate broker, as well as a licensed and practiced attorney and contractor in Japan. kanroku is truly a full-service brokerage, and  we are not just a real estate agent, Its a licensed real estate broker, as well as a licensed and practiced attorney and contractor in Japan.
